name: Last Window
description:
Made for Github GameOff 2020 .

After a critical mission failure, a crew of four astronauts get stranded on the moon on their way to Earth. To get back home, they must get an old moon base up and running and send a distress signal to Earth within seven days. This while trying to keep sane, fed and healthy. 

If this mission fails, there is no other chance of survival.
